issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Some queries with union all throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
when:
set hive.cbo.enable=false;
set hive.ppd.remove.duplicatefilters=true;
The stack is as:
{noformat}
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 67, Size: 67 
        at java.util.ArrayList.rangeCheck(ArrayList.java:635) 
        at java.util.ArrayList.get(ArrayList.java:411) 
        at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.optimizer.ColumnPrunerProcCtx.genColLists(ColumnPrunerProcCtx.java:161)

        at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.Driver.compile(Driver.java:305) 
        at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.Driver.compileInternal(Driver.java:1119) 
        at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.Driver.runInternal(Driver.java:1167)

fields.summary: Some queries with Union all fail when CBO is off

comments.body:
Using genColLists(curOp, child) to get Union's prunelist caused the issue, should use genColLists(child)
Attach patch1 with the fix and the test.

[~ctang.ma], could you review the fix? genColLists(curOp, child) seems to have some limitations, it assumes Union all's parent have equal or greater number of columns and matching positions. But it is not always true especially after parent operator processed. So the fix use getColLists(child) to get the UnionAll 's 
prunelist.  Thanks

[~ychena] I wonder if you can add more tests with combination of hive.ppd.remove.duplicatefilters, hive.cbo.enable, and hive.optimize.ppd if possible? Did the issue only happen when cbo is off? How about cbo is enabled but hive.ppd.remove.duplicatefilters disabled? Will hive.optimize.ppd off work around the issue?

[~ctang.ma], The bug can only be reproduced when cbo is false, duplicatefilters is true.
Attach patch2 with added tests for all the combination values of related properties.
Patch looks good to me, +1 pending the testing. It is even better if the test case could be simplified, but I understand it is hard to reproduce the issue with some simple queries.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12800229/HIVE-13570.2.patch

{color:green}SUCCESS:{color} +1 due to 1 test(s) being added or modified.

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to 71 failed/errored test(s), 9939 tests executed
